import React,{useEffect,useState} from 'react' import {useHistory} from 'react-router-dom' import axios from 'axios' function Post() { const [result1,setresult1] = useState([]) const [page_no, setpage_no] = useState(0) const post_container = useRef(0); let history=useHistory(); useEffect(() => { if(!localStorage.getItem('Token')) { history.push('./login') } FetchPost() }, []) window.onscroll = function() { if (inputEl.current.offsetHeight() >= document.body.offsetHeight) { // you're at the bottom of the page FetchPost(page_no); setpage_no(page_no+1); } }; const FetchPost=(index=0)=>axios({method: 'post',url:'http://localhost:5000/getPost',data:{page_no:1}}).then(result=>{ setresult1((pre)=>pre.concat({...result.data[0]})); console.log(JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('LogInUser'))._id) }); return (
{ (result1.length!==0)?result1.map(val=>
{val.title}
{val.category}
{ val.userId }
{val.date} {val.time}
  • Share
  • Flag
  • 4 Comments

    • 4
) :'' }
) } export default Post
